basics.name: Christian Joudon
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: Currently pursuing a Computer Science degree at the University of Hawaii at Manoa with an expected graduation in Fall 2024. My academic background began in Biochemistry, granting me a deep understanding of chemistry and biology. Coupled with diverse experiences ranging from roles in the restaurant sector to filmmaking and creative endeavors, I'm equipped with strong communication and analytical skills. As I continue my journey in Computer Science, I aim to blend my creativity, analytical expertise, and industry insights to make a significant impact in the field.
